titles.title: Honoring Daniel Joseph "Rusty" Staub for excellence in his career as a professional baseball player and for his entrepreneurship, humanitarian work, and philanthropy, and for other purposes.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Oversight and Government Reform.
